  73 /**                                                                                                      
  74  * A base class fragment to be used with ChartsActivity. The fragment can supply                         
  75  * a title to be displayed in the activity by returning non-null in #getTitle()                          
  76  * Broadcast events can be received by overriding #onReceive(Context,Intent).                            
  77  * The chart can be refreshed by calling #refresh()                                                      
  78  * Implement refreshInBackground(DBHandler, GBDevice) to fetch the samples from the DB,                  
  79  * and add the samples to the chart. The actual rendering, which must be performed in the UI             
  80  * thread, must be done in #renderCharts().                                                              
  81  * Access functionality of the hosting activity with #getHost()                                          
  82  * <p/>                                                                                                  
  83  * The hosting ChartsHost activity provides a section for displaying a date or date range                
  84  * being the basis for the chart, as well as two buttons for moving backwards and forward                
  85  * in time. The date is held by the activity, so that it can be shared by multiple chart                 
  86  * fragments. It is still the responsibility of the (currently visible) chart fragment                   
  87  * to set the desired date in the ChartsActivity via #setDateRange(Date,Date).                           
  88  * The default implementations #handleDatePrev(Date,Date) and #handleDateNext(Date,Date)                 
  89  * shift the date by one day.                                                                            
  90  */                                                                                                      
  91 public abstract class AbstractChartFragment extends AbstractGBFragment {                                 
  92     protected final int ANIM_TIME = 250;                                                                 
  93                                                                                                          
  94     private static final Logger LOG = LoggerFactory.getLogger(AbstractChartFragment.class);              
  95                                                                                                          
  96     private final Set<String> mIntentFilterActions;                                                      
  97     private final BroadcastReceiver mReceiver = new BroadcastReceiver() {                                
  98         @Override                                                                                        
  99         public void onReceive(Context context, Intent intent) {                                          
 100             AbstractChartFragment.this.onReceive(context, intent);                                       
 101         }                                                                                                
 102     };

 149     protected AbstractChartFragment(String... intentFilterActions) {                                     
 150         mIntentFilterActions = new HashSet<>();                                                          
 151         if (intentFilterActions != null) {                                                               
 152             mIntentFilterActions.addAll(Arrays.asList(intentFilterActions));                             
 153         }                                                                                                
 154         mIntentFilterActions.add(ChartsHost.DATE_NEXT);                                                  
 155         mIntentFilterActions.add(ChartsHost.DATE_PREV);                                                  
 156         mIntentFilterActions.add(ChartsHost.REFRESH);                                                    
 157     }

 159     @Override                                                                                            
 160     public void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState) {                                                    
 161         super.onCreate(savedInstanceState);                                                              
 162                                                                                                          
 163         init();                                                                                          
 164                                                                                                          
 165         IntentFilter filter = new IntentFilter();                                                        
 166         for (String action : mIntentFilterActions) {                                                     
 167             filter.addAction(action);                                                                    
 168         }                                                                                                
 169         LocalBroadcastManager.getInstance(getActivity()).registerReceiver(mReceiver, filter);            
 170     }

 217     /**                                                                                                  
 218      * Called when this fragment has been fully scrolled into the activity.

 221      * @see #onMadeInvisibleInActivity()

 223     @Override                                                                                            
 224     protected void onMadeVisibleInActivity() {                                                           
 225         super.onMadeVisibleInActivity();                                                                 
 226         showDateBar(true);                                                                               
 227         if (isChartDirty()) {                                                                            
 228             refresh();                                                                                   
 229         }                                                                                                
 230     }

 232     protected void showDateBar(boolean show) {                                                           
 233         getChartsHost().getDateBar().setVisibility(show ? View.VISIBLE : View.INVISIBLE);                
 234     }

 236     @Override                                                                                            
 237     public void onDestroy() {                                                                            
 238         super.onDestroy();                                                                               
 239         LocalBroadcastManager.getInstance(getActivity()).unregisterReceiver(mReceiver);                  
 240     }                                                                                                    
 241                                                                                                          
 242     protected void onReceive(Context context, Intent intent) {                                           
 243         String action = intent.getAction();                                                              
 244         if (ChartsHost.REFRESH.equals(action)) {                                                         
 245             refresh();                                                                                   
 246         } else if (ChartsHost.DATE_NEXT.equals(action)) {                                                
 247             handleDateNext(getStartDate(), getEndDate());                                                
 248         } else if (ChartsHost.DATE_PREV.equals(action)) {                                                
 249             handleDatePrev(getStartDate(), getEndDate());                                                
 250         }                                                                                                
 251     }                                                                                                    
 252                                                                                                          
 253     /**                                                                                                  
 254      * Default implementation shifts the dates by one day, if visible                                    
 255      * and calls #refreshIfVisible().                                                                    
 256      *                                                                                                   
 257      * @param startDate                                                                                  
 258      * @param endDate                                                                                    
 259      */                                                                                                  
 260     protected void handleDatePrev(Date startDate, Date endDate) {                                        
 261         if (isVisibleInActivity()) {                                                                     
 262             if (!shiftDates(startDate, endDate, -1)) {                                                   
 263                 return;                                                                                  
 264             }                                                                                            
 265         }                                                                                                
 266         refreshIfVisible();                                                                              
 267     }                                                                                                    
 268                                                                                                          
 269     /**                                                                                                  
 270      * Default implementation shifts the dates by one day, if visible                                    
 271      * and calls #refreshIfVisible().                                                                    
 272      *                                                                                                   
 273      * @param startDate                                                                                  
 274      * @param endDate                                                                                    
 275      */                                                                                                  
 276     protected void handleDateNext(Date startDate, Date endDate) {                                        
 277         if (isVisibleInActivity()) {                                                                     
 278             if (!shiftDates(startDate, endDate, +1)) {                                                   
 279                 return;                                                                                  
 280             }                                                                                            
 281         }                                                                                                
 282         refreshIfVisible();                                                                              
 283     }                                                                                                    
 284                                                                                                          
 285     protected void refreshIfVisible() {                                                                  
 286         if (isVisibleInActivity()) {                                                                     
 287             refresh();                                                                                   
 288         } else {                                                                                         
 289             mChartDirty = true;                                                                          
 290         }                                                                                                
 291     }                                                                                                    
 292                                                                                                          
 293     /**                                                                                                  
 294      * Shifts the given dates by offset days. offset may be positive or negative.                        
 295      *                                                                                                   
 296      * @param startDate                                                                                  
 297      * @param endDate                                                                                    
 298      * @param offset    a positive or negative number of days to shift the dates                         
 299      * @return true if the shift was successful and false otherwise                                      
 300      */                                                                                                  
 301     protected boolean shiftDates(Date startDate, Date endDate, int offset) {                             
 302         Date newStart = DateTimeUtils.shiftByDays(startDate, offset);                                    
 303         Date newEnd = DateTimeUtils.shiftByDays(endDate, offset);                                        
 304                                                                                                          
 305         return setDateRange(newStart, newEnd);                                                           
 306     }                                                                                                    
 307                                                                                                          
 308     protected Integer getColorFor(int activityKind) {                                                    
 309         switch (activityKind) {                                                                          
 310             case ActivityKind.TYPE_DEEP_SLEEP:                                                           
 311                 return akDeepSleep.color;                                                                
 312             case ActivityKind.TYPE_LIGHT_SLEEP:                                                          
 313                 return akLightSleep.color;                                                               
 314             case ActivityKind.TYPE_ACTIVITY:                                                             
 315                 return akActivity.color;                                                                 
 316         }                                                                                                
 317         return akActivity.color;                                                                         
 318     }

 349     protected void configureChartDefaults(Chart<?> chart) {                                              
 350         chart.getXAxis().setValueFormatter(new TimestampValueFormatter());                               
 351         chart.getDescription().setText("");                                                              
 352                                                                                                          
 353         // if enabled, the chart will always start at zero on the y-axis                                 
 354         chart.setNoDataText(getString(R.string.chart_no_data_synchronize));                              
 355                                                                                                          
 356         // disable value highlighting                                                                    
 357         chart.setHighlightPerTapEnabled(false);                                                          
 358                                                                                                          
 359         // enable touch gestures                                                                         
 360         chart.setTouchEnabled(true);                                                                     
 361                                                                                                          
 362 // commented out: this has weird bugs/sideeffects at least on WeekStepsCharts                            
 363 // where only the first Day-label is drawn, because AxisRenderer.computeAxisValues(float,float)          
 364 // appears to have an overflow when calculating 'n' (number of entries)                                  
 365 //        chart.getXAxis().setGranularity(60*5);                                                         
 366                                                                                                          
 367         setupLegend(chart);                                                                              
 368     }                                                                                                    
 369                                                                                                          
 370     protected void configureBarLineChartDefaults(BarLineChartBase<?> chart) {                            
 371         configureChartDefaults(chart);                                                                   
 372         if (chart instanceof BarChart) {                                                                 
 373             ((BarChart) chart).setFitBars(true);                                                         
 374         }                                                                                                
 375                                                                                                          
 376         // enable scaling and dragging                                                                   
 377         chart.setDragEnabled(true);                                                                      
 378         chart.setScaleEnabled(true);                                                                     
 379                                                                                                          
 380         // if disabled, scaling can be done on x- and y-axis separately                                  
 381 //        chart.setPinchZoom(true);                                                                      
 382                                                                                                          
 383         chart.setDrawGridBackground(false);                                                              
 384     }                                                                                                    
 385                                                                                                          
 386     /**                                                                                                  
 387      * This method will invoke a background task to read the data from the                               
 388      * database, analyze it, prepare it for the charts and eventually call                               
 389      * #renderCharts                                                                                     
 390      */                                                                                                  
 391     protected void refresh() {                                                                           
 392         ChartsHost chartsHost = getChartsHost();                                                         
 393         if (chartsHost != null) {                                                                        
 394             if (chartsHost.getDevice() != null) {                                                        
 395                 mChartDirty = false;                                                                     
 396                 updateDateInfo(getStartDate(), getEndDate());                                            
 397                 if (refreshTask != null && refreshTask.getStatus() != AsyncTask.Status.FINISHED) {       
 398                     refreshTask.cancel(true);                                                            
 399                 }                                                                                        
 400                 refreshTask = createRefreshTask("Visualizing data", getActivity()).execute();            
 401             }                                                                                            
 402         }                                                                                                
 403     }                                                                                                    
 404                                                                                                          
 405     /**                                                                                                  
 406      * This method reads the data from the database, analyzes and prepares it for                        
 407      * the charts. This will be called from a background task, so there must not be                      
 408      * any UI access. #updateChartsInUIThread and #renderCharts will be automatically called after this m🔵
 409      */

 413      * Triggers the actual (re-) rendering of the chart.                                                 
 414      * Always called from the UI thread.                                                                 
 415      */                                                                                                  
 416     protected abstract void renderCharts();

 666         return new RefreshTask(task, context);

 669     public class RefreshTask extends DBAccess {                                                          
 670         private ChartsData chartsData;                                                                   
 671                                                                                                          
 672         public RefreshTask(String task, Context context) {                                               
 673             super(task, context);                                                                        
 674         }                                                                                                
 675                                                                                                          
 676         @Override                                                                                        
 677         protected void doInBackground(DBHandler db) {                                                    
 678             ChartsHost chartsHost = getChartsHost();                                                     
 679             if (chartsHost != null) {                                                                    
 680                 chartsData = refreshInBackground(chartsHost, db, chartsHost.getDevice());                
 681             } else {                                                                                     
 682                 cancel(true);                                                                            
 683             }                                                                                            
 684         }                                                                                                
 685                                                                                                          
 686         @Override                                                                                        
 687         protected void onPostExecute(Object o) {                                                         
 688             super.onPostExecute(o);                                                                      
 689             FragmentActivity activity = getActivity();                                                   
 690             if (activity != null && !activity.isFinishing() && !activity.isDestroyed()) {                
 691                 updateChartsnUIThread(chartsData);                                                       
 692                 renderCharts();                                                                          
 693             } else {                                                                                     
 694                 LOG.info("Not rendering charts because activity is not available anymore");              
 695             }                                                                                            
 696         }                                                                                                
 697     }                                                                                                    
 698                                                                                                          
 699     protected abstract void updateChartsnUIThread(ChartsData chartsData);                                
 700                                                                                                          
 701     /**                                                                                                  
 702      * Returns true if the date was successfully shifted, and false if the shift                         
 703      * was ignored, e.g. when the to-value is in the future.                                             
 704      *                                                                                                   
 705      * @param from                                                                                       
 706      * @param to                                                                                         
 707      */                                                                                                  
 708     public boolean setDateRange(Date from, Date to) {                                                    
 709         if (from.compareTo(to) > 0) {                                                                    
 710             throw new IllegalArgumentException("Bad date range: " + from + ".." + to);                   
 711         }                                                                                                
 712         Date now = new Date();                                                                           
 713         if (to.after(now)) {                                                                             
 714             return false;                                                                                
 715         }                                                                                                
 716         setStartDate(from);                                                                              
 717         setEndDate(to);                                                                                  
 718         return true;                                                                                     
 719     }                                                                                                    
 720                                                                                                          
 721     protected void updateDateInfo(Date from, Date to) {                                                  
 722         if (from.equals(to)) {                                                                           
 723             getChartsHost().setDateInfo(DateTimeUtils.formatDate(from));                                 
 724         } else {                                                                                         
 725             getChartsHost().setDateInfo(DateTimeUtils.formatDateRange(from, to));                        
 726         }                                                                                                
 727     }

 729     protected List<? extends ActivitySample> getSamples(DBHandler db, GBDevice device) {                 
 730         int tsStart = getTSStart();                                                                      
 731         int tsEnd = getTSEnd();                                                                          
 732         List<ActivitySample> samples = (List<ActivitySample>) getSamples(db, device, tsStart, tsEnd);    
 733         ensureStartAndEndSamples(samples, tsStart, tsEnd);                                               
 734 //        List<ActivitySample> samples2 = new ArrayList<>();                                             
 735 //        int min = Math.min(samples.size(), 10);                                                        
 736 //        int min = Math.min(samples.size(), 10);                                                        
 737 //        for (int i = 0; i < min; i++) {                                                                
 738 //            samples2.add(samples.get(i));                                                              
 739 //        }                                                                                              
 740 //        return samples2;                                                                               
 741         return samples;                                                                                  
 742     }                                                                                                    
 743                                                                                                          
 744     protected void ensureStartAndEndSamples(List<ActivitySample> samples, int tsStart, int tsEnd) {      
 745         if (samples == null || samples.isEmpty()) {                                                      
 746             return;                                                                                      
 747         }                                                                                                
 748         ActivitySample lastSample = samples.get(samples.size() - 1);                                     
 749         if (lastSample.getTimestamp() < tsEnd) {                                                         
 750             samples.add(createTrailingActivitySample(lastSample, tsEnd));                                
 751         }                                                                                                
 752                                                                                                          
 753         ActivitySample firstSample = samples.get(0);                                                     
 754         if (firstSample.getTimestamp() > tsStart) {                                                      
 755             samples.add(createTrailingActivitySample(firstSample, tsStart));                             
 756         }                                                                                                
 757     }                                                                                                    
 758                                                                                                          
 759     private ActivitySample createTrailingActivitySample(ActivitySample referenceSample, int timestamp) { 
 760         TrailingActivitySample sample = new TrailingActivitySample();                                    
 761         if (referenceSample instanceof AbstractActivitySample) {                                         
 762             AbstractActivitySample reference = (AbstractActivitySample) referenceSample;                 
 763             sample.setUserId(reference.getUserId());                                                     
 764             sample.setDeviceId(reference.getDeviceId());                                                 
 765             sample.setProvider(reference.getProvider());                                                 
 766         }                                                                                                
 767         sample.setTimestamp(timestamp);                                                                  
 768         return sample;                                                                                   
 769     }                                                                                                    
 770                                                                                                          
 771     private int getTSEnd() {                                                                             
 772         return toTimestamp(getEndDate());                                                                
 773     }                                                                                                    
 774                                                                                                          
 775     private int getTSStart() {                                                                           
 776         return toTimestamp(getStartDate());                                                              
 777     }                                                                                                    
 778                                                                                                          
 779     private int toTimestamp(Date date) {                                                                 
 780         return (int) ((date.getTime() / 1000));                                                          
 781     }

 788             this.xValueFormatter = xValueFormatter;                                                      
 789             this.data = data;                                                                            
 790         }                                                                                                
 791

 793             return xValueFormatter;                                                                      
 794         }

 798         }                                                                                                
 799     }

 801     protected static class SampleXLabelFormatter implements IAxisValueFormatter {                        
 802         private final TimestampTranslation tsTranslation;                                                
 803         SimpleDateFormat annotationDateFormat = new SimpleDateFormat("HH:mm");                           
 804 //        SimpleDateFormat dateFormat = new SimpleDateFormat("dd.MM.yyyy HH:mm");                        
 805         Calendar cal = GregorianCalendar.getInstance();                                                  
 806                                                                                                          
 807         public SampleXLabelFormatter(TimestampTranslation tsTranslation) {                               
 808             this.tsTranslation = tsTranslation;                                                          
 809                                                                                                          
 810         }                                                                                                
 811         // TODO: this does not work. Cannot use precomputed labels                                       
 812         @Override                                                                                        
 813         public String getFormattedValue(float value, AxisBase axis) {                                    
 814             cal.clear();                                                                                 
 815             int ts = (int) value;                                                                        
 816             cal.setTimeInMillis(tsTranslation.toOriginalValue(ts) * 1000L);                              
 817             Date date = cal.getTime();                                                                   
 818             String dateString = annotationDateFormat.format(date);                                       
 819             return dateString;                                                                           
 820         }                                                                                                
 821     }                                                                                                    
 822                                                                                                          
 823     protected static class PreformattedXIndexLabelFormatter implements IAxisValueFormatter {             
 824         private ArrayList<String> xLabels;                                                               
 825                                                                                                          
 826         public PreformattedXIndexLabelFormatter(ArrayList<String> xLabels) {                             
 827             this.xLabels = xLabels;                                                                      
 828                                                                                                          
 829         }                                                                                                
 830         @Override                                                                                        
 831         public String getFormattedValue(float value, AxisBase axis) {                                    
 832             int index = (int) value;                                                                     
 833             if (xLabels == null || index >= xLabels.size()) {                                            
 834                 return String.valueOf(value);                                                            
 835             }                                                                                            
 836             return xLabels.get(index);                                                                   
 837         }                                                                                                
 838     }                                                                                                    
 839                                                                                                          
 840     /**                                                                                                  
 841      * Awkward class that helps in translating long timestamp                                            
 842      * values to float (sic!) values. It basically rebases all                                           
 843      * timestamps to a base (the very first) timestamp value.                                            
 844      *                                                                                                   
 845      * It does this so that the large timestamp values can be used                                       
 846      * floating point values, where the mantissa is just 24 bits.                                        
 847      */                                                                                                  
 848     protected static class TimestampTranslation {                                                        
 849         private int tsOffset = -1;                                                                       
 850                                                                                                          
 851         public int shorten(int timestamp) {                                                              
 852             if (tsOffset == -1) {                                                                        
 853                 tsOffset = timestamp;                                                                    
 854                 return 0;                                                                                
 855             }                                                                                            
 856             return timestamp - tsOffset;                                                                 
 857         }                                                                                                
 858                                                                                                          
 859         public int toOriginalValue(int timestamp) {                                                      
 860             if (tsOffset == -1) {                                                                        
 861                 return timestamp;                                                                        
 862             }                                                                                            
 863             return timestamp + tsOffset;                                                                 
 864         }                                                                                                
 865     }                                                                                                    
 866 }

  73 /**                                                                                                      
  74  * A base class fragment to be used with ChartsActivity. The fragment can supply                         
  75  * a title to be displayed in the activity by returning non-null in #getTitle()                          
  76  * Broadcast events can be received by overriding #onReceive(Context,Intent).                            
  77  * The chart can be refreshed by calling #refresh()                                                      
  78  * Implement refreshInBackground(DBHandler, GBDevice) to fetch the samples from the DB,                  
  79  * and add the samples to the chart. The actual rendering, which must be performed in the UI             
  80  * thread, must be done in #renderCharts().                                                              
  81  * Access functionality of the hosting activity with #getHost()                                          
  82  * <p/>                                                                                                  
  83  * The hosting ChartsHost activity provides a section for displaying a date or date range                
  84  * being the basis for the chart, as well as two buttons for moving backwards and forward                
  85  * in time. The date is held by the activity, so that it can be shared by multiple chart                 
  86  * fragments. It is still the responsibility of the (currently visible) chart fragment                   
  87  * to set the desired date in the ChartsActivity via #setDateRange(Date,Date).                           
  88  * The default implementations #handleDatePrev(Date,Date) and #handleDateNext(Date,Date)                 
  89  * shift the date by one day.                                                                            
  90  */                                                                                                      
  91 public abstract class AbstractChartFragment extends AbstractGBFragment {                                 
  92     protected final int ANIM_TIME = 250;                                                                 
  93                                                                                                          
  94     private static final Logger LOG = LoggerFactory.getLogger(AbstractChartFragment.class);              
  95                                                                                                          
  96     private final Set<String> mIntentFilterActions;                                                      
  97     private final BroadcastReceiver mReceiver = new BroadcastReceiver() {                                
  98         @Override                                                                                        
  99         public void onReceive(Context context, Intent intent) {                                          
 100             AbstractChartFragment.this.onReceive(context, intent);                                       
 101         }                                                                                                
 102     };                                                                                                   
 103     private boolean mChartDirty = true;                                                                  
 104     private AsyncTask refreshTask;                                                                       
 105                                                                                                          
 106     public boolean isChartDirty() {                                                                      
 107         return mChartDirty;                                                                              
 108     }                                                                                                    
 109                                                                                                          
 110     @Override                                                                                            
 111     public abstract String getTitle();                                                                   
 112                                                                                                          
 113     public boolean supportsHeartrate(GBDevice device) {                                                  
 114         DeviceCoordinator coordinator = DeviceHelper.getInstance().getCoordinator(device);               
 115         return coordinator != null && coordinator.supportsHeartRateMeasurement(device);                  
 116     }

 149     protected AbstractChartFragment(String... intentFilterActions) {                                     
 150         mIntentFilterActions = new HashSet<>();                                                          
 151         if (intentFilterActions != null) {                                                               
 152             mIntentFilterActions.addAll(Arrays.asList(intentFilterActions));                             
 153         }                                                                                                
 154         mIntentFilterActions.add(ChartsHost.DATE_NEXT);                                                  
 155         mIntentFilterActions.add(ChartsHost.DATE_PREV);                                                  
 156         mIntentFilterActions.add(ChartsHost.REFRESH);                                                    
 157     }

 159     @Override                                                                                            
 160     public void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState) {                                                    
 161         super.onCreate(savedInstanceState);                                                              
 162                                                                                                          
 163         init();                                                                                          
 164                                                                                                          
 165         IntentFilter filter = new IntentFilter();                                                        
 166         for (String action : mIntentFilterActions) {                                                     
 167             filter.addAction(action);                                                                    
 168         }                                                                                                
 169         LocalBroadcastManager.getInstance(getActivity()).registerReceiver(mReceiver, filter);            
 170     }

 217     /**                                                                                                  
 218      * Called when this fragment has been fully scrolled into the activity.                              
 219      *                                                                                                   
 220      * @see #isVisibleInActivity()                                                                       
 221      * @see #onMadeInvisibleInActivity()                                                                 
 222      */                                                                                                  
 223     @Override                                                                                            
 224     protected void onMadeVisibleInActivity() {                                                           
 225         super.onMadeVisibleInActivity();                                                                 
 226         showDateBar(true);                                                                               
 227         if (isChartDirty()) {                                                                            
 228             refresh();                                                                                   
 229         }                                                                                                
 230     }                                                                                                    
 231                                                                                                          
 232     protected void showDateBar(boolean show) {                                                           
 233         getChartsHost().getDateBar().setVisibility(show ? View.VISIBLE : View.INVISIBLE);                
 234     }                                                                                                    
 235                                                                                                          
 236     @Override                                                                                            
 237     public void onDestroy() {                                                                            
 238         super.onDestroy();                                                                               
 239         LocalBroadcastManager.getInstance(getActivity()).unregisterReceiver(mReceiver);                  
 240     }                                                                                                    
 241                                                                                                          
 242     protected void onReceive(Context context, Intent intent) {                                           
 243         String action = intent.getAction();                                                              
 244         if (ChartsHost.REFRESH.equals(action)) {                                                         
 245             refresh();                                                                                   
 246         } else if (ChartsHost.DATE_NEXT.equals(action)) {                                                
 247             handleDateNext(getStartDate(), getEndDate());                                                
 248         } else if (ChartsHost.DATE_PREV.equals(action)) {                                                
 249             handleDatePrev(getStartDate(), getEndDate());                                                
 250         }                                                                                                
 251     }                                                                                                    
 252                                                                                                          
 253     /**                                                                                                  
 254      * Default implementation shifts the dates by one day, if visible                                    
 255      * and calls #refreshIfVisible().                                                                    
 256      *                                                                                                   
 257      * @param startDate                                                                                  
 258      * @param endDate                                                                                    
 259      */                                                                                                  
 260     protected void handleDatePrev(Date startDate, Date endDate) {                                        
 261         if (isVisibleInActivity()) {                                                                     
 262             if (!shiftDates(startDate, endDate, -1)) {                                                   
 263                 return;                                                                                  
 264             }                                                                                            
 265         }                                                                                                
 266         refreshIfVisible();                                                                              
 267     }                                                                                                    
 268                                                                                                          
 269     /**                                                                                                  
 270      * Default implementation shifts the dates by one day, if visible                                    
 271      * and calls #refreshIfVisible().                                                                    
 272      *                                                                                                   
 273      * @param startDate                                                                                  
 274      * @param endDate                                                                                    
 275      */                                                                                                  
 276     protected void handleDateNext(Date startDate, Date endDate) {                                        
 277         if (isVisibleInActivity()) {                                                                     
 278             if (!shiftDates(startDate, endDate, +1)) {                                                   
 279                 return;                                                                                  
 280             }                                                                                            
 281         }                                                                                                
 282         refreshIfVisible();                                                                              
 283     }                                                                                                    
 284                                                                                                          
 285     protected void refreshIfVisible() {                                                                  
 286         if (isVisibleInActivity()) {                                                                     
 287             refresh();                                                                                   
 288         } else {                                                                                         
 289             mChartDirty = true;                                                                          
 290         }                                                                                                
 291     }                                                                                                    
 292                                                                                                          
 293     /**                                                                                                  
 294      * Shifts the given dates by offset days. offset may be positive or negative.                        
 295      *                                                                                                   
 296      * @param startDate                                                                                  
 297      * @param endDate                                                                                    
 298      * @param offset    a positive or negative number of days to shift the dates                         
 299      * @return true if the shift was successful and false otherwise                                      
 300      */                                                                                                  
 301     protected boolean shiftDates(Date startDate, Date endDate, int offset) {                             
 302         Date newStart = DateTimeUtils.shiftByDays(startDate, offset);                                    
 303         Date newEnd = DateTimeUtils.shiftByDays(endDate, offset);                                        
 304                                                                                                          
 305         return setDateRange(newStart, newEnd);                                                           
 306     }                                                                                                    
 307                                                                                                          
 308     protected Integer getColorFor(int activityKind) {                                                    
 309         switch (activityKind) {                                                                          
 310             case ActivityKind.TYPE_DEEP_SLEEP:                                                           
 311                 return akDeepSleep.color;                                                                
 312             case ActivityKind.TYPE_LIGHT_SLEEP:                                                          
 313                 return akLightSleep.color;                                                               
 314             case ActivityKind.TYPE_ACTIVITY:                                                             
 315                 return akActivity.color;                                                                 
 316         }                                                                                                
 317         return akActivity.color;                                                                         
 318     }

 370     protected void configureBarLineChartDefaults(BarLineChartBase<?> chart) {                            
 371         configureChartDefaults(chart);                                                                   
 372         if (chart instanceof BarChart) {                                                                 
 373             ((BarChart) chart).setFitBars(true);                                                         
 374         }                                                                                                
 375                                                                                                          
 376         // enable scaling and dragging                                                                   
 377         chart.setDragEnabled(true);                                                                      
 378         chart.setScaleEnabled(true);                                                                     
 379                                                                                                          
 380         // if disabled, scaling can be done on x- and y-axis separately                                  
 381 //        chart.setPinchZoom(true);                                                                      
 382                                                                                                          
 383         chart.setDrawGridBackground(false);                                                              
 384     }

 386     /**                                                                                                  
 387      * This method will invoke a background task to read the data from the                               
 388      * database, analyze it, prepare it for the charts and eventually call                               
 389      * #renderCharts                                                                                     
 390      */                                                                                                  
 391     protected void refresh() {                                                                           
 392         ChartsHost chartsHost = getChartsHost();                                                         
 393         if (chartsHost != null) {                                                                        
 394             if (chartsHost.getDevice() != null) {                                                        
 395                 mChartDirty = false;                                                                     
 396                 updateDateInfo(getStartDate(), getEndDate());                                            
 397                 if (refreshTask != null && refreshTask.getStatus() != AsyncTask.Status.FINISHED) {       
 398                     refreshTask.cancel(true);                                                            
 399                 }                                                                                        
 400                 refreshTask = createRefreshTask("Visualizing data", getActivity()).execute();            
 401             }                                                                                            
 402         }                                                                                                
 403     }                                                                                                    
 404

 669     protected RefreshTask createRefreshTask(String task, Context context) {                              
 670         return new RefreshTask(task, context);                                                           
 671     }                                                                                                    
 672                                                                                                          
 673     public class RefreshTask extends DBAccess {                                                          
 674         private ChartsData chartsData;                                                                   
 675                                                                                                          
 676         public RefreshTask(String task, Context context) {                                               
 677             super(task, context);                                                                        
 678         }                                                                                                
 679                                                                                                          
 680         @Override                                                                                        
 681         protected void doInBackground(DBHandler db) {                                                    
 682             ChartsHost chartsHost = getChartsHost();                                                     
 683             if (chartsHost != null) {                                                                    
 684                 chartsData = refreshInBackground(chartsHost, db, chartsHost.getDevice());                
 685             } else {                                                                                     
 686                 cancel(true);                                                                            
 687             }                                                                                            
 688         }                                                                                                
 689                                                                                                          
 690         @Override                                                                                        
 691         protected void onPostExecute(Object o) {                                                         
 692             super.onPostExecute(o);                                                                      
 693             FragmentActivity activity = getActivity();                                                   
 694             if (activity != null && !activity.isFinishing() && !activity.isDestroyed()) {                
 695                 updateChartsnUIThread(chartsData);                                                       
 696                 renderCharts();                                                                          
 697             } else {                                                                                     
 698                 LOG.info("Not rendering charts because activity is not available anymore");              
 699             }                                                                                            
 700         }                                                                                                
 701     }                                                                                                    
 702                                                                                                          
 703     protected abstract void updateChartsnUIThread(ChartsData chartsData);                                
 704                                                                                                          
 705     /**                                                                                                  
 706      * Returns true if the date was successfully shifted, and false if the shift                         
 707      * was ignored, e.g. when the to-value is in the future.                                             
 708      *                                                                                                   
 709      * @param from                                                                                       
 710      * @param to                                                                                         
 711      */                                                                                                  
 712     public boolean setDateRange(Date from, Date to) {                                                    
 713         if (from.compareTo(to) > 0) {                                                                    
 714             throw new IllegalArgumentException("Bad date range: " + from + ".." + to);                   
 715         }                                                                                                
 716         Date now = new Date();                                                                           
 717         if (to.after(now)) {                                                                             
 718             return false;                                                                                
 719         }                                                                                                
 720         setStartDate(from);                                                                              
 721         setEndDate(to);                                                                                  
 722         return true;                                                                                     
 723     }                                                                                                    
 724                                                                                                          
 725     protected void updateDateInfo(Date from, Date to) {                                                  
 726         if (from.equals(to)) {                                                                           
 727             getChartsHost().setDateInfo(DateTimeUtils.formatDate(from));                                 
 728         } else {                                                                                         
 729             getChartsHost().setDateInfo(DateTimeUtils.formatDateRange(from, to));                        
 730         }                                                                                                
 731     }                                                                                                    
 732                                                                                                          
 733     protected List<? extends ActivitySample> getSamples(DBHandler db, GBDevice device) {                 
 734         int tsStart = getTSStart();                                                                      
 735         int tsEnd = getTSEnd();                                                                          
 736         List<ActivitySample> samples = (List<ActivitySample>) getSamples(db, device, tsStart, tsEnd);    
 737         ensureStartAndEndSamples(samples, tsStart, tsEnd);                                               
 738 //        List<ActivitySample> samples2 = new ArrayList<>();                                             
 739 //        int min = Math.min(samples.size(), 10);                                                        
 740 //        int min = Math.min(samples.size(), 10);                                                        
 741 //        for (int i = 0; i < min; i++) {                                                                
 742 //            samples2.add(samples.get(i));                                                              
 743 //        }                                                                                              
 744 //        return samples2;                                                                               
 745         return samples;                                                                                  
 746     }                                                                                                    
 747                                                                                                          
 748     protected void ensureStartAndEndSamples(List<ActivitySample> samples, int tsStart, int tsEnd) {      
 749         if (samples == null || samples.isEmpty()) {                                                      
 750             return;                                                                                      
 751         }                                                                                                
 752         ActivitySample lastSample = samples.get(samples.size() - 1);                                     
 753         if (lastSample.getTimestamp() < tsEnd) {                                                         
 754             samples.add(createTrailingActivitySample(lastSample, tsEnd));                                
 755         }                                                                                                
 756                                                                                                          
 757         ActivitySample firstSample = samples.get(0);                                                     
 758         if (firstSample.getTimestamp() > tsStart) {                                                      
 759             samples.add(createTrailingActivitySample(firstSample, tsStart));                             
 760         }                                                                                                
 761     }                                                                                                    
 762                                                                                                          
 763     private ActivitySample createTrailingActivitySample(ActivitySample referenceSample, int timestamp) { 
 764         TrailingActivitySample sample = new TrailingActivitySample();                                    
 765         if (referenceSample instanceof AbstractActivitySample) {                                         
 766             AbstractActivitySample reference = (AbstractActivitySample) referenceSample;                 
 767             sample.setUserId(reference.getUserId());                                                     
 768             sample.setDeviceId(reference.getDeviceId());                                                 
 769             sample.setProvider(reference.getProvider());                                                 
 770         }                                                                                                
 771         sample.setTimestamp(timestamp);                                                                  
 772         return sample;                                                                                   
 773     }                                                                                                    
 774                                                                                                          
 775     private int getTSEnd() {                                                                             
 776         return toTimestamp(getEndDate());                                                                
 777     }                                                                                                    
 778                                                                                                          
 779     private int getTSStart() {                                                                           
 780         return toTimestamp(getStartDate());                                                              
 781     }                                                                                                    
 782                                                                                                          
 783     private int toTimestamp(Date date) {                                                                 
 784         return (int) ((date.getTime() / 1000));                                                          
 785     }
