 805     protected static class SampleXLabelFormatter implements IAxisValueFormatter {                        
 806         private final TimestampTranslation tsTranslation;                                                
 807         SimpleDateFormat annotationDateFormat = new SimpleDateFormat("HH:mm");                           
 808 //        SimpleDateFormat dateFormat = new SimpleDateFormat("dd.MM.yyyy HH:mm");                        
 809         Calendar cal = GregorianCalendar.getInstance();                                                  
 810                                                                                                          
 811         public SampleXLabelFormatter(TimestampTranslation tsTranslation) {                               
 812             this.tsTranslation = tsTranslation;                                                          
 813                                                                                                          
 814         }                                                                                                
 815         // TODO: this does not work. Cannot use precomputed labels                                       
 816         @Override                                                                                        
 817         public String getFormattedValue(float value, AxisBase axis) {                                    
 818             cal.clear();                                                                                 
 819             int ts = (int) value;                                                                        
 820             cal.setTimeInMillis(tsTranslation.toOriginalValue(ts) * 1000L);                              
 821             Date date = cal.getTime();                                                                   
 822             String dateString = annotationDateFormat.format(date);                                       
 823             return dateString;                                                                           
 824         }                                                                                                
 825     }                                                                                                    
 826                                                                                                          
 827     protected static class PreformattedXIndexLabelFormatter implements IAxisValueFormatter {             
 828         private ArrayList<String> xLabels;                                                               
 829                                                                                                          
 830         public PreformattedXIndexLabelFormatter(ArrayList<String> xLabels) {                             
 831             this.xLabels = xLabels;                                                                      
 832                                                                                                          
 833         }                                                                                                
 834         @Override                                                                                        
 835         public String getFormattedValue(float value, AxisBase axis) {                                    
 836             int index = (int) value;                                                                     
 837             if (xLabels == null || index >= xLabels.size()) {                                            
 838                 return String.valueOf(value);                                                            
 839             }                                                                                            
 840             return xLabels.get(index);                                                                   
 841         }                                                                                                
 842     }                                                                                                    
 843                                                                                                          
 844     /**                                                                                                  
 845      * Awkward class that helps in translating long timestamp                                            
 846      * values to float (sic!) values. It basically rebases all                                           
 847      * timestamps to a base (the very first) timestamp value.                                            
 848      *                                                                                                   
 849      * It does this so that the large timestamp values can be used                                       
 850      * floating point values, where the mantissa is just 24 bits.                                        
 851      */                                                                                                  
 852     protected static class TimestampTranslation {                                                        
 853         private int tsOffset = -1;                                                                       
 854                                                                                                          
 855         public int shorten(int timestamp) {                                                              
 856             if (tsOffset == -1) {                                                                        
 857                 tsOffset = timestamp;                                                                    
 858                 return 0;                                                                                
 859             }                                                                                            
 860             return timestamp - tsOffset;                                                                 
 861         }                                                                                                
 862                                                                                                          
 863         public int toOriginalValue(int timestamp) {                                                      
 864             if (tsOffset == -1) {                                                                        
 865                 return timestamp;                                                                        
 866             }                                                                                            
 867             return timestamp + tsOffset;                                                                 
 868         }                                                                                                
 869     }                                                                                                    
 870 }

  70 /**                                                                                                      
  71  * A base class fragment to be used with ChartsActivity. The fragment can supply                         
  72  * a title to be displayed in the activity by returning non-null in #getTitle()                          
  73  * Broadcast events can be received by overriding #onReceive(Context,Intent).                            
  74  * The chart can be refreshed by calling #refresh()                                                      
  75  * Implement refreshInBackground(DBHandler, GBDevice) to fetch the samples from the DB,                  
  76  * and add the samples to the chart. The actual rendering, which must be performed in the UI             
  77  * thread, must be done in #renderCharts().                                                              
  78  * Access functionality of the hosting activity with #getHost()                                          
  79  * <p/>                                                                                                  
  80  * The hosting ChartsHost activity provides a section for displaying a date or date range                
  81  * being the basis for the chart, as well as two buttons for moving backwards and forward                
  82  * in time. The date is held by the activity, so that it can be shared by multiple chart                 
  83  * fragments. It is still the responsibility of the (currently visible) chart fragment                   
  84  * to set the desired date in the ChartsActivity via #setDateRange(Date,Date).                           
  85  * The default implementations #handleDatePrev(Date,Date) and #handleDateNext(Date,Date)                 
  86  * shift the date by one day.                                                                            
  87  */                                                                                                      
  88 public abstract class AbstractChartFragment extends AbstractGBFragment {                                 
  89     protected final int ANIM_TIME = 250;                                                                 
  90                                                                                                          
  91     private static final Logger LOG = LoggerFactory.getLogger(AbstractChartFragment.class);              
  92                                                                                                          
  93     private final Set<String> mIntentFilterActions;                                                      
  94                                                                                                          
  95     private final BroadcastReceiver mReceiver = new BroadcastReceiver() {                                
  96         @Override                                                                                        
  97         public void onReceive(Context context, Intent intent) {                                          
  98             AbstractChartFragment.this.onReceive(context, intent);                                       
  99         }                                                                                                
 100     };

 116     }

 162     protected AbstractChartFragment(String... intentFilterActions) {                                     
 163         mIntentFilterActions = new HashSet<>();                                                          
 164         if (intentFilterActions != null) {                                                               
 165             mIntentFilterActions.addAll(Arrays.asList(intentFilterActions));                             
 166         }                                                                                                
 167         mIntentFilterActions.add(ChartsHost.DATE_NEXT);                                                  
 168         mIntentFilterActions.add(ChartsHost.DATE_PREV);                                                  
 169         mIntentFilterActions.add(ChartsHost.REFRESH);                                                    
 170     }

 178         IntentFilter filter = new IntentFilter();                                                        
 179         for (String action : mIntentFilterActions) {                                                     
 180             filter.addAction(action);                                                                    
 181         }                                                                                                
 182         LocalBroadcastManager.getInstance(getActivity()).registerReceiver(mReceiver, filter);            
 183     }

 254                                                                                                          
 255     protected void onReceive(Context context, Intent intent) {                                           
 256         String action = intent.getAction();                                                              
 257         if (ChartsHost.REFRESH.equals(action)) {                                                         
 258             refresh();                                                                                   
 259         } else if (ChartsHost.DATE_NEXT.equals(action)) {                                                
 260             handleDateNext(getStartDate(), getEndDate());                                                
 261         } else if (ChartsHost.DATE_PREV.equals(action)) {                                                
 262             handleDatePrev(getStartDate(), getEndDate());                                                
 263         }                                                                                                
 264     }                                                                                                    
 265                                                                                                          
 266     /**                                                                                                  
 267      * Default implementation shifts the dates by one day, if visible                                    
 268      * and calls #refreshIfVisible().                                                                    
 269      *                                                                                                   
 270      * @param startDate                                                                                  
 271      * @param endDate                                                                                    
 272      */                                                                                                  
 273     protected void handleDatePrev(Date startDate, Date endDate) {                                        
 274         if (isVisibleInActivity()) {                                                                     
 275             if (!shiftDates(startDate, endDate, -1)) {                                                   
 276                 return;                                                                                  
 277             }                                                                                            
 278         }                                                                                                
 279         refreshIfVisible();                                                                              
 280     }                                                                                                    
 281                                                                                                          
 282     /**                                                                                                  
 283      * Default implementation shifts the dates by one day, if visible                                    
 284      * and calls #refreshIfVisible().                                                                    
 285      *                                                                                                   
 286      * @param startDate                                                                                  
 287      * @param endDate                                                                                    
 288      */                                                                                                  
 289     protected void handleDateNext(Date startDate, Date endDate) {                                        
 290         if (isVisibleInActivity()) {                                                                     
 291             if (!shiftDates(startDate, endDate, +1)) {                                                   
 292                 return;                                                                                  
 293             }                                                                                            
 294         }                                                                                                
 295         refreshIfVisible();                                                                              
 296     }                                                                                                    
 297                                                                                                          
 298     protected void refreshIfVisible() {                                                                  
 299         if (isVisibleInActivity()) {                                                                     
 300             refresh();                                                                                   
 301         } else {                                                                                         
 302             mChartDirty = true;                                                                          
 303         }                                                                                                
 304     }                                                                                                    
 305                                                                                                          
 306     /**                                                                                                  
 307      * Shifts the given dates by offset days. offset may be positive or negative.                        
 308      *                                                                                                   
 309      * @param startDate                                                                                  
 310      * @param endDate                                                                                    
 311      * @param offset    a positive or negative number of days to shift the dates                         
 312      * @return true if the shift was successful and false otherwise                                      
 313      */                                                                                                  
 314     protected boolean shiftDates(Date startDate, Date endDate, int offset) {                             
 315         Date newStart = DateTimeUtils.shiftByDays(startDate, offset);                                    
 316         Date newEnd = DateTimeUtils.shiftByDays(endDate, offset);                                        
 317                                                                                                          
 318         return setDateRange(newStart, newEnd);                                                           
 319     }

 321     protected Integer getColorFor(int activityKind) {                                                    
 322         switch (activityKind) {                                                                          
 323             case ActivityKind.TYPE_DEEP_SLEEP:                                                           
 324                 return akDeepSleep.color;                                                                
 325             case ActivityKind.TYPE_LIGHT_SLEEP:                                                          
 326                 return akLightSleep.color;                                                               
 327             case ActivityKind.TYPE_ACTIVITY:                                                             
 328                 return akActivity.color;                                                                 
 329         }                                                                                                
 330         return akActivity.color;                                                                         
 331     }

 398     /**                                                                                                  
 399      * This method will invoke a background task to read the data from the                               
 400      * database, analyze it, prepare it for the charts and eventually call                               
 401      * #renderCharts                                                                                     
 402      */                                                                                                  
 403     protected void refresh() {                                                                           
 404         ChartsHost chartsHost = getChartsHost();                                                         
 405         if (chartsHost != null) {                                                                        
 406             if (chartsHost.getDevice() != null) {                                                        
 407                 mChartDirty = false;                                                                     
 408                 updateDateInfo(getStartDate(), getEndDate());                                            
 409                 if (refreshTask != null && refreshTask.getStatus() != AsyncTask.Status.FINISHED) {       
 410                     refreshTask.cancel(true);                                                            
 411                 }                                                                                        
 412                 refreshTask = createRefreshTask("Visualizing data", getActivity()).execute();            
 413             }                                                                                            
 414         }                                                                                                
 415     }

 629     protected RefreshTask createRefreshTask(String task, Context context) {

 632                                                                                                          
 633     public class RefreshTask extends DBAccess {                                                          
 634         private ChartsData chartsData;                                                                   
 635                                                                                                          
 636         public RefreshTask(String task, Context context) {                                               
 637             super(task, context);                                                                        
 638         }                                                                                                
 639                                                                                                          
 640         @Override                                                                                        
 641         protected void doInBackground(DBHandler db) {                                                    
 642             ChartsHost chartsHost = getChartsHost();                                                     
 643             if (chartsHost != null) {                                                                    
 644                 chartsData = refreshInBackground(chartsHost, db, chartsHost.getDevice());                
 645             } else {                                                                                     
 646                 cancel(true);                                                                            
 647             }                                                                                            
 648         }                                                                                                
 649                                                                                                          
 650         @Override                                                                                        
 651         protected void onPostExecute(Object o) {                                                         
 652             super.onPostExecute(o);                                                                      
 653             FragmentActivity activity = getActivity();                                                   
 654             if (((activity != null) && (!activity.isFinishing())) && (!activity.isDestroyed())) {        
 655                 updateChartsnUIThread(chartsData);                                                       
 656                 renderCharts();                                                                          
 657             } else {                                                                                     
 658                 LOG.info("Not rendering charts because activity is not available anymore");              
 659             }                                                                                            
 660         }                                                                                                
 661     }                                                                                                    
 662                                                                                                          
 663     protected abstract void updateChartsnUIThread(ChartsData chartsData);                                
 664                                                                                                          
 665     /**                                                                                                  
 666      * Returns true if the date was successfully shifted, and false if the shift                         
 667      * was ignored, e.g. when the to-value is in the future.                                             
 668      *                                                                                                   
 669      * @param from                                                                                       
 670      * @param to                                                                                         
 671      */                                                                                                  
 672     public boolean setDateRange(Date from, Date to) {                                                    
 673         if (from.compareTo(to) > 0) {                                                                    
 674             throw new IllegalArgumentException("Bad date range: " + from + ".." + to);                   
 675         }                                                                                                
 676         Date now = new Date();                                                                           
 677         if (to.after(now)) {                                                                             
 678             return false;                                                                                
 679         }                                                                                                
 680         setStartDate(from);                                                                              
 681         setEndDate(to);                                                                                  
 682         return true;                                                                                     
 683     }                                                                                                    
 684                                                                                                          
 685     protected void updateDateInfo(Date from, Date to) {                                                  
 686         if (from.equals(to)) {                                                                           
 687             getChartsHost().setDateInfo(DateTimeUtils.formatDate(from));                                 
 688         } else {                                                                                         
 689             getChartsHost().setDateInfo(DateTimeUtils.formatDateRange(from, to));                        
 690         }                                                                                                
 691     }                                                                                                    
 692                                                                                                          
 693     protected List<? extends ActivitySample> getSamples(DBHandler db, GBDevice device) {                 
 694         int tsStart = getTSStart();                                                                      
 695         int tsEnd = getTSEnd();                                                                          
 696         List<ActivitySample> samples = (List<ActivitySample>) getSamples(db, device, tsStart, tsEnd);    
 697         ensureStartAndEndSamples(samples, tsStart, tsEnd);                                               
 698     //        List<ActivitySample> samples2 = new ArrayList<>();                                         
 699     //        int min = Math.min(samples.size(), 10);                                                    
 700     //        int min = Math.min(samples.size(), 10);                                                    
 701     //        for (int i = 0; i < min; i++) {                                                            
 702     //            samples2.add(samples.get(i));                                                          
 703     //        }                                                                                          
 704     //        return samples2;                                                                           
 705         return samples;                                                                                  
 706     }                                                                                                    
 707                                                                                                          
 708     protected void ensureStartAndEndSamples(List<ActivitySample> samples, int tsStart, int tsEnd) {      
 709         if (samples == null || samples.isEmpty()) {                                                      
 710             return;                                                                                      
 711         }                                                                                                
 712         ActivitySample lastSample = samples.get(samples.size() - 1);                                     
 713         if (lastSample.getTimestamp() < tsEnd) {                                                         
 714             samples.add(createTrailingActivitySample(lastSample, tsEnd));                                
 715         }                                                                                                
 716                                                                                                          
 717         ActivitySample firstSample = samples.get(0);                                                     
 718         if (firstSample.getTimestamp() > tsStart) {                                                      
 719             samples.add(createTrailingActivitySample(firstSample, tsStart));                             
 720         }                                                                                                
 721     }                                                                                                    
 722                                                                                                          
 723     private ActivitySample createTrailingActivitySample(ActivitySample referenceSample, int timestamp) { 
 724         TrailingActivitySample sample = new TrailingActivitySample();                                    
 725         if (referenceSample instanceof AbstractActivitySample) {                                         
 726             AbstractActivitySample reference = (AbstractActivitySample) referenceSample;                 
 727             sample.setUserId(reference.getUserId());                                                     
 728             sample.setDeviceId(reference.getDeviceId());                                                 
 729             sample.setProvider(reference.getProvider());                                                 
 730         }                                                                                                
 731         sample.setTimestamp(timestamp);                                                                  
 732         return sample;                                                                                   
 733     }                                                                                                    
 734                                                                                                          
 735     private int getTSEnd() {                                                                             
 736         return toTimestamp(getEndDate());                                                                
 737     }                                                                                                    
 738                                                                                                          
 739     private int getTSStart() {                                                                           
 740         return toTimestamp(getStartDate());                                                              
 741     }                                                                                                    
 742                                                                                                          
 743     private int toTimestamp(Date date) {                                                                 
 744         return (int) ((date.getTime() / 1000));                                                          
 745     }

 747     public static class DefaultChartsData<T extends ChartData<?>> extends ChartsData {                   
 748         private final T data;                                                                            
 749                                                                                                          
 750         private IAxisValueFormatter xValueFormatter;                                                     
 751                                                                                                          
 752         public DefaultChartsData(T data, IAxisValueFormatter xValueFormatter) {                          
 753             this.xValueFormatter = xValueFormatter;                                                      
 754             this.data = data;                                                                            
 755         }                                                                                                
 756                                                                                                          
 757         public IAxisValueFormatter getXValueFormatter() {                                                
 758             return xValueFormatter;                                                                      
 759         }                                                                                                
 760                                                                                                          
 761         public T getData() {                                                                             
 762             return data;                                                                                 
 763         }                                                                                                
 764     }                                                                                                    
 765                                                                                                          
 766     protected static class SampleXLabelFormatter implements IAxisValueFormatter {                        
 767         private final TimestampTranslation tsTranslation;                                                
 768                                                                                                          
 769         SimpleDateFormat annotationDateFormat = new SimpleDateFormat("HH:mm");                           
 770                                                                                                          
 771         // SimpleDateFormat dateFormat = new SimpleDateFormat("dd.MM.yyyy HH:mm");                       
 772         Calendar cal = GregorianCalendar.getInstance();                                                  
 773                                                                                                          
 774         public SampleXLabelFormatter(TimestampTranslation tsTranslation) {                               
 775             this.tsTranslation = tsTranslation;                                                          
 776         }                                                                                                
 777                                                                                                          
 778         // TODO: this does not work. Cannot use precomputed labels                                       
 779         @Override                                                                                        
 780         public String getFormattedValue(float value, AxisBase axis) {                                    
 781             cal.clear();                                                                                 
 782             int ts = ((int) (value));                                                                    
 783             cal.setTimeInMillis(tsTranslation.toOriginalValue(ts) * 1000L);                              
 784             Date date = cal.getTime();                                                                   
 785             String dateString = annotationDateFormat.format(date);                                       
 786             return dateString;                                                                           
 787         }                                                                                                
 788     }                                                                                                    
 789                                                                                                          
 790     protected static class PreformattedXIndexLabelFormatter implements IAxisValueFormatter {             
 791         private ArrayList<String> xLabels;                                                               
 792                                                                                                          
 793         public PreformattedXIndexLabelFormatter(ArrayList<String> xLabels) {                             
 794             this.xLabels = xLabels;                                                                      
 795         }                                                                                                
 796                                                                                                          
 797         @Override                                                                                        
 798         public String getFormattedValue(float value, AxisBase axis) {                                    
 799             int index = ((int) (value));                                                                 
 800             if ((xLabels == null) || (index >= xLabels.size())) {                                        
 801                 return String.valueOf(value);                                                            
 802             }                                                                                            
 803             return xLabels.get(index);                                                                   
 804         }                                                                                                
 805     }                                                                                                    
 806                                                                                                          
 807     /**                                                                                                  
 808      * Awkward class that helps in translating long timestamp                                            
 809      * values to float (sic!) values. It basically rebases all                                           
 810      * timestamps to a base (the very first) timestamp value.                                            
 811      *                                                                                                   
 812      * It does this so that the large timestamp values can be used                                       
 813      * floating point values, where the mantissa is just 24 bits.                                        
 814      */                                                                                                  
 815     protected static class TimestampTranslation {                                                        
 816         private int tsOffset = -1;                                                                       
 817                                                                                                          
 818         public int shorten(int timestamp) {                                                              
 819             if (tsOffset == (-1)) {                                                                      
 820                 tsOffset = timestamp;                                                                    
 821                 return 0;                                                                                
 822             }                                                                                            
 823             return timestamp - tsOffset;                                                                 
 824         }                                                                                                
 825                                                                                                          
 826         public int toOriginalValue(int timestamp) {                                                      
 827             if (tsOffset == (-1)) {                                                                      
 828                 return timestamp;                                                                        
 829             }                                                                                            
 830             return timestamp + tsOffset;                                                                 
 831         }                                                                                                
 832     }                                                                                                    
 833 }
ours vs. base theirs vs. base

  77  /**                                                                                                               
  78   * A base class fragment to be used with ChartsActivity. The fragment can supply                                  
  79   * a title to be displayed in the activity by returning non-null in #getTitle()                                   
  80   * Broadcast events can be received by overriding #onReceive(Context,Intent).                                     
  81   * The chart can be refreshed by calling #refresh()                                                               
  82   * Implement refreshInBackground(DBHandler, GBDevice) to fetch the samples from the DB,                           
  83   * and add the samples to the chart. The actual rendering, which must be performed in the UI                      
  84   * thread, must be done in #renderCharts().                                                                       
  85   * Access functionality of the hosting activity with #getHost()                                                   
  86   * <p/>                                                                                                           
  87   * The hosting ChartsHost activity provides a section for displaying a date or date range                         
  88   * being the basis for the chart, as well as two buttons for moving backwards and forward                         
  89   * in time. The date is held by the activity, so that it can be shared by multiple chart                          
  90   * fragments. It is still the responsibility of the (currently visible) chart fragment                            
  91   * to set the desired date in the ChartsActivity via #setDateRange(Date,Date).                                    
  92   * The default implementations #handleDatePrev(Date,Date) and #handleDateNext(Date,Date)                          
  93   * shift the date by one day.                                                                                     
  94   */                                                                                                               
  95  public abstract class AbstractChartFragment extends AbstractGBFragment {                                          
  96      protected final int ANIM_TIME = 250;                                                                          
  97                                                                                                                    
  98      private static final Logger LOG = LoggerFactory.getLogger(AbstractChartFragment.class);                       
  99                                                                                                                    
 100      private final Set<String> mIntentFilterActions;                                                               
 101      private final BroadcastReceiver mReceiver = new BroadcastReceiver() {                                         
 102          @Override                                                                                                 
 103          public void onReceive(Context context, Intent intent) {                                                   
 104              AbstractChartFragment.this.onReceive(context, intent);                                                
 105          }                                                                                                         
 106      };

 153      protected AbstractChartFragment(String... intentFilterActions) {                                              
 154          mIntentFilterActions = new HashSet<>();                                                                   
 155          if (intentFilterActions != null) {                                                                        
 156              mIntentFilterActions.addAll(Arrays.asList(intentFilterActions));                                      
 157          }                                                                                                         
 158          mIntentFilterActions.add(ChartsHost.DATE_NEXT);                                                           
 159          mIntentFilterActions.add(ChartsHost.DATE_PREV);                                                           
 160          mIntentFilterActions.add(ChartsHost.REFRESH);                                                             
 161      }

 170          for (String action : mIntentFilterActions) {                                                              
 171              filter.addAction(action);                                                                             
 172          }                                                                                                         
 173          LocalBroadcastManager.getInstance(getActivity()).registerReceiver(mReceiver, filter);                     
 174      }

 245                                                                                                                    
 246      protected void onReceive(Context context, Intent intent) {                                                    
 247          String action = intent.getAction();                                                                       
 248          if (ChartsHost.REFRESH.equals(action)) {                                                                  
 249              refresh();                                                                                            
 250          } else if (ChartsHost.DATE_NEXT.equals(action)) {                                                         
 251              handleDateNext(getStartDate(), getEndDate());                                                         
 252          } else if (ChartsHost.DATE_PREV.equals(action)) {                                                         
 253              handleDatePrev(getStartDate(), getEndDate());                                                         
 254          }                                                                                                         
 255      }                                                                                                             
 256                                                                                                                    
 257      /**                                                                                                           
 258       * Default implementation shifts the dates by one day, if visible                                             
 259       * and calls #refreshIfVisible().                                                                             
 260       *                                                                                                            
 261       * @param startDate                                                                                           
 262       * @param endDate                                                                                             
 263       */                                                                                                           
 264      protected void handleDatePrev(Date startDate, Date endDate) {                                                 
 265          if (isVisibleInActivity()) {                                                                              
 266              if (!shiftDates(startDate, endDate, -1)) {                                                            
 267                  return;                                                                                           
 268              }                                                                                                     
 269          }                                                                                                         
 270          refreshIfVisible();                                                                                       
 271      }                                                                                                             
 272                                                                                                                    
 273      /**                                                                                                           
 274       * Default implementation shifts the dates by one day, if visible                                             
 275       * and calls #refreshIfVisible().                                                                             
 276       *                                                                                                            
 277       * @param startDate                                                                                           
 278       * @param endDate                                                                                             
 279       */                                                                                                           
 280      protected void handleDateNext(Date startDate, Date endDate) {                                                 
 281          if (isVisibleInActivity()) {                                                                              
 282              if (!shiftDates(startDate, endDate, +1)) {                                                            
 283                  return;                                                                                           
 284              }                                                                                                     
 285          }                                                                                                         
 286          refreshIfVisible();                                                                                       
 287      }                                                                                                             
 288                                                                                                                    
 289      protected void refreshIfVisible() {                                                                           
 290          if (isVisibleInActivity()) {                                                                              
 291              refresh();                                                                                            
 292          } else {                                                                                                  
 293              mChartDirty = true;                                                                                   
 294          }                                                                                                         
 295      }                                                                                                             
 296                                                                                                                    
 297      /**                                                                                                           
 298       * Shifts the given dates by offset days. offset may be positive or negative.                                 
 299       *                                                                                                            
 300       * @param startDate                                                                                           
 301       * @param endDate                                                                                             
 302       * @param offset    a positive or negative number of days to shift the dates                                  
 303       * @return true if the shift was successful and false otherwise                                               
 304       */                                                                                                           
 305      protected boolean shiftDates(Date startDate, Date endDate, int offset) {                                      
 306          Date newStart = DateTimeUtils.shiftByDays(startDate, offset);                                             
 307          Date newEnd = DateTimeUtils.shiftByDays(endDate, offset);                                                 
 308                                                                                                                    
 309          return setDateRange(newStart, newEnd);                                                                    
 310      }

 312      protected Integer getColorFor(int activityKind) {                                                             
 313          switch (activityKind) {                                                                                   
 314              case ActivityKind.TYPE_DEEP_SLEEP:                                                                    
 315                  return akDeepSleep.color;                                                                         
 316              case ActivityKind.TYPE_LIGHT_SLEEP:                                                                   
 317                  return akLightSleep.color;                                                                        
 318              case ActivityKind.TYPE_ACTIVITY:                                                                      
 319                  return akActivity.color;                                                                          
 320          }                                                                                                         
 321          return akActivity.color;                                                                                  
 322      }

 353      protected void configureChartDefaults(Chart<?> chart) {                                                       
 354          chart.getXAxis().setValueFormatter(new TimestampValueFormatter());                                        
 355          chart.getDescription().setText("");                                                                       
 356                                                                                                                    
 357          // if enabled, the chart will always start at zero on the y-axis                                          
 358          chart.setNoDataText(getString(R.string.chart_no_data_synchronize));                                       
 359                                                                                                                    
 360          // disable value highlighting                                                                             
 361          chart.setHighlightPerTapEnabled(false);                                                                   
 362                                                                                                                    
 363          // enable touch gestures                                                                                  
 364          chart.setTouchEnabled(true);                                                                              
 365                                                                                                                    
 366  // commented out: this has weird bugs/sideeffects at least on WeekStepsCharts                                     
 367  // where only the first Day-label is drawn, because AxisRenderer.computeAxisValues(float,float)                   
 368  // appears to have an overflow when calculating 'n' (number of entries)                                           
 369  //        chart.getXAxis().setGranularity(60*5);                                                                  
 370                                                                                                                    
 371          setupLegend(chart);                                                                                       
 372      }

 374      protected void configureBarLineChartDefaults(BarLineChartBase<?> chart) {                                     
 375          configureChartDefaults(chart);                                                                            
 376          if (chart instanceof BarChart) {                                                                          
 377              ((BarChart) chart).setFitBars(true);                                                                  
 378          }                                                                                                         
 379                                                                                                                    
 380          // enable scaling and dragging                                                                            
 381          chart.setDragEnabled(true);                                                                               
 382          chart.setScaleEnabled(true);                                                                              
 383                                                                                                                    
 384          // if disabled, scaling can be done on x- and y-axis separately                                           
 385  //        chart.setPinchZoom(true);                                                                               
 386                                                                                                                    
 387          chart.setDrawGridBackground(false);                                                                       
 388      }                                                                                                             
 389                                                                                                                    
 390      /**                                                                                                           
 391       * This method will invoke a background task to read the data from the                                        
 392       * database, analyze it, prepare it for the charts and eventually call                                        
 393       * #renderCharts                                                                                              
 394       */                                                                                                           
 395      protected void refresh() {                                                                                    
 396          ChartsHost chartsHost = getChartsHost();                                                                  
 397          if (chartsHost != null) {                                                                                 
 398              if (chartsHost.getDevice() != null) {                                                                 
 399                  mChartDirty = false;                                                                              
 400                  updateDateInfo(getStartDate(), getEndDate());                                                     
 401                  if (refreshTask != null && refreshTask.getStatus() != AsyncTask.Status.FINISHED) {                
 402                      refreshTask.cancel(true);                                                                     
 403                  }                                                                                                 
 404                  refreshTask = createRefreshTask("Visualizing data", getActivity()).execute();                     
 405              }                                                                                                     
 406          }                                                                                                         
 407      }                                                                                                             
 408                                                                                                                    
 409      /**                                                                                                           
 410       * This method reads the data from the database, analyzes and prepares it for                                 
 411       * the charts. This will be called from a background task, so there must not be                               
 412       * any UI access. #updateChartsInUIThread and #renderCharts will be automatically called after this method.   
 413       */                                                                                                           
 414      protected abstract ChartsData refreshInBackground(ChartsHost chartsHost, DBHandler db, GBDevice device);      
 415                                                                                                                    
 416      /**                                                                                                           
 417       * Triggers the actual (re-) rendering of the chart.                                                          
 418       * Always called from the UI thread.                                                                          
 419       */                                                                                                           
 420      protected abstract void renderCharts();                                                                       
 421                                                                                                                    
 422      protected DefaultChartsData<CombinedData> refresh(GBDevice gbDevice, List<? extends ActivitySample> samples) {

 423  //        Calendar cal = GregorianCalendar.getInstance();                                                         
 424  //        cal.clear();                                                                                            
 425          TimestampTranslation tsTranslation = new TimestampTranslation();                                          
 426  //        Date date;                                                                                              
 427  //        String dateStringFrom = "";                                                                             
 428  //        String dateStringTo = "";
