 655                                                                                                                    
 656      public class RefreshTask extends DBAccess {                                                                   
 657          private ChartsData chartsData;                                                                            
 658                                                                                                                    
 659          public RefreshTask(String task, Context context) {                                                        
 660              super(task, context);                                                                                 
 661          }                                                                                                         
 662                                                                                                                    
 663          @Override                                                                                                 
 664          protected void doInBackground(DBHandler db) {                                                             
 665              ChartsHost chartsHost = getChartsHost();                                                              
 666              if (chartsHost != null) {                                                                             
 667                  chartsData = refreshInBackground(chartsHost, db, chartsHost.getDevice());                         
 668              } else {                                                                                              
 669                  cancel(true);                                                                                     
 670              }                                                                                                     
 671          }                                                                                                         
 672                                                                                                                    
 673          @Override                                                                                                 
 674          protected void onPostExecute(Object o) {                                                                  
 675              super.onPostExecute(o);                                                                               
 676              FragmentActivity activity = getActivity();                                                            
 677              if (activity != null && !activity.isFinishing() && !activity.isDestroyed()) {                         
 678                  updateChartsnUIThread(chartsData);                                                                
 679                  renderCharts();                                                                                   
 680              } else {                                                                                              
 681                  LOG.info("Not rendering charts because activity is not available anymore");                       
 682              }                                                                                                     
 683          }                                                                                                         
 684      }                                                                                                             
 685                                                                                                                    
 686      protected abstract void updateChartsnUIThread(ChartsData chartsData);                                         
 687                                                                                                                    
 688      /**                                                                                                           
 689       * Returns true if the date was successfully shifted, and false if the shift                                  
 690       * was ignored, e.g. when the to-value is in the future.                                                      
 691       *                                                                                                            
 692       * @param from                                                                                                
 693       * @param to                                                                                                  
 694       */                                                                                                           
 695      public boolean setDateRange(Date from, Date to) {                                                             
 696          if (from.compareTo(to) > 0) {                                                                             
 697              throw new IllegalArgumentException("Bad date range: " + from + ".." + to);                            
 698          }                                                                                                         
 699          Date now = new Date();                                                                                    
 700          if (to.after(now)) {                                                                                      
 701              return false;                                                                                         
 702          }                                                                                                         
 703          setStartDate(from);                                                                                       
 704          setEndDate(to);                                                                                           
 705          return true;                                                                                              
 706      }                                                                                                             
 707                                                                                                                    
 708      protected void updateDateInfo(Date from, Date to) {                                                           
 709          if (from.equals(to)) {                                                                                    
 710              getChartsHost().setDateInfo(DateTimeUtils.formatDate(from));                                          
 711          } else {                                                                                                  
 712              getChartsHost().setDateInfo(DateTimeUtils.formatDateRange(from, to));                                 
 713          }                                                                                                         
 714      }                                                                                                             
 715                                                                                                                    
 716      protected List<? extends ActivitySample> getSamples(DBHandler db, GBDevice device) {                          
 717          int tsStart = getTSStart();                                                                               
 718          int tsEnd = getTSEnd();                                                                                   
 719          List<ActivitySample> samples = (List<ActivitySample>) getSamples(db, device, tsStart, tsEnd);             
 720          ensureStartAndEndSamples(samples, tsStart, tsEnd);                                                        
 721  //        List<ActivitySample> samples2 = new ArrayList<>();                                                      
 722  //        int min = Math.min(samples.size(), 10);                                                                 
 723  //        int min = Math.min(samples.size(), 10);                                                                 
 724  //        for (int i = 0; i < min; i++) {                                                                         
 725  //            samples2.add(samples.get(i));                                                                       
 726  //        }                                                                                                       
 727  //        return samples2;                                                                                        
 728          return samples;                                                                                           
 729      }                                                                                                             
 730                                                                                                                    
 731      protected void ensureStartAndEndSamples(List<ActivitySample> samples, int tsStart, int tsEnd) {               
 732          if (samples == null || samples.isEmpty()) {                                                               
 733              return;                                                                                               
 734          }                                                                                                         
 735          ActivitySample lastSample = samples.get(samples.size() - 1);                                              
 736          if (lastSample.getTimestamp() < tsEnd) {                                                                  
 737              samples.add(createTrailingActivitySample(lastSample, tsEnd));                                         
 738          }                                                                                                         
 739                                                                                                                    
 740          ActivitySample firstSample = samples.get(0);                                                              
 741          if (firstSample.getTimestamp() > tsStart) {                                                               
 742              samples.add(createTrailingActivitySample(firstSample, tsStart));                                      
 743          }                                                                                                         
 744      }                                                                                                             
 745                                                                                                                    
 746      private ActivitySample createTrailingActivitySample(ActivitySample referenceSample, int timestamp) {          
 747          TrailingActivitySample sample = new TrailingActivitySample();                                             
 748          if (referenceSample instanceof AbstractActivitySample) {                                                  
 749              AbstractActivitySample reference = (AbstractActivitySample) referenceSample;                          
 750              sample.setUserId(reference.getUserId());                                                              
 751              sample.setDeviceId(reference.getDeviceId());                                                          
 752              sample.setProvider(reference.getProvider());                                                          
 753          }                                                                                                         
 754          sample.setTimestamp(timestamp);                                                                           
 755          return sample;                                                                                            
 756      }                                                                                                             
 757                                                                                                                    
 758      private int getTSEnd() {                                                                                      
 759          return toTimestamp(getEndDate());                                                                         
 760      }                                                                                                             
 761                                                                                                                    
 762      private int getTSStart() {                                                                                    
 763          return toTimestamp(getStartDate());                                                                       
 764      }                                                                                                             
 765                                                                                                                    
 766      private int toTimestamp(Date date) {                                                                          
 767          return (int) ((date.getTime() / 1000));                                                                   
 768      }

 770      public static class DefaultChartsData<T extends ChartData<?>> extends ChartsData {                            
 771          private final T data;                                                                                     
 772          private IAxisValueFormatter xValueFormatter;                                                              
 773                                                                                                                    
 774          public DefaultChartsData(T data, IAxisValueFormatter xValueFormatter) {                                   
 775              this.xValueFormatter = xValueFormatter;                                                               
 776              this.data = data;                                                                                     
 777          }                                                                                                         
 778                                                                                                                    
 779          public IAxisValueFormatter getXValueFormatter() {                                                         
 780              return xValueFormatter;                                                                               
 781          }                                                                                                         
 782

 784              return data;                                                                                          
 785          }                                                                                                         
 786      }

 788      protected static class SampleXLabelFormatter implements IAxisValueFormatter {                                 
 789          private final TimestampTranslation tsTranslation;                                                         
 790          SimpleDateFormat annotationDateFormat = new SimpleDateFormat("HH:mm");                                    
 791  //        SimpleDateFormat dateFormat = new SimpleDateFormat("dd.MM.yyyy HH:mm");                                 
 792          Calendar cal = GregorianCalendar.getInstance();                                                           
 793                                                                                                                    
 794          public SampleXLabelFormatter(TimestampTranslation tsTranslation) {                                        
 795              this.tsTranslation = tsTranslation;                                                                   
 796                                                                                                                    
 797          }                                                                                                         
 798          // TODO: this does not work. Cannot use precomputed labels                                                
 799          @Override                                                                                                 
 800          public String getFormattedValue(float value, AxisBase axis) {                                             
 801              cal.clear();                                                                                          
 802              int ts = (int) value;                                                                                 
 803              cal.setTimeInMillis(tsTranslation.toOriginalValue(ts) * 1000L);                                       
 804              Date date = cal.getTime();                                                                            
 805              String dateString = annotationDateFormat.format(date);                                                
 806              return dateString;                                                                                    
 807          }                                                                                                         
 808      }                                                                                                             
 809                                                                                                                    
 810      protected static class PreformattedXIndexLabelFormatter implements IAxisValueFormatter {                      
 811          private ArrayList<String> xLabels;                                                                        
 812                                                                                                                    
 813          public PreformattedXIndexLabelFormatter(ArrayList<String> xLabels) {                                      
 814              this.xLabels = xLabels;                                                                               
 815                                                                                                                    
 816          }                                                                                                         
 817          @Override                                                                                                 
 818          public String getFormattedValue(float value, AxisBase axis) {                                             
 819              int index = (int) value;                                                                              
 820              if (xLabels == null || index >= xLabels.size()) {                                                     
 821                  return String.valueOf(value);                                                                     
 822              }                                                                                                     
 823              return xLabels.get(index);                                                                            
 824          }                                                                                                         
 825      }                                                                                                             
 826                                                                                                                    
 827      /**                                                                                                           
 828       * Awkward class that helps in translating long timestamp                                                     
 829       * values to float (sic!) values. It basically rebases all                                                    
 830       * timestamps to a base (the very first) timestamp value.                                                     
 831       *                                                                                                            
 832       * It does this so that the large timestamp values can be used                                                
 833       * floating point values, where the mantissa is just 24 bits.                                                 
 834       */                                                                                                           
 835      protected static class TimestampTranslation {                                                                 
 836          private int tsOffset = -1;                                                                                
 837                                                                                                                    
 838          public int shorten(int timestamp) {                                                                       
 839              if (tsOffset == -1) {                                                                                 
 840                  tsOffset = timestamp;                                                                             
 841                  return 0;                                                                                         
 842              }                                                                                                     
 843              return timestamp - tsOffset;                                                                          
 844          }                                                                                                         
 845                                                                                                                    
 846          public int toOriginalValue(int timestamp) {                                                               
 847              if (tsOffset == -1) {                                                                                 
 848                  return timestamp;                                                                                 
 849              }                                                                                                     
 850              return timestamp + tsOffset;                                                                          
 851          }                                                                                                         
 852      }

  78  /**                                                                                                               
  79   * A base class fragment to be used with ChartsActivity. The fragment can supply                                  
  80   * a title to be displayed in the activity by returning non-null in #getTitle()                                   
  81   * Broadcast events can be received by overriding #onReceive(Context,Intent).                                     
  82   * The chart can be refreshed by calling #refresh()                                                               
  83   * Implement refreshInBackground(DBHandler, GBDevice) to fetch the samples from the DB,                           
  84   * and add the samples to the chart. The actual rendering, which must be performed in the UI                      
  85   * thread, must be done in #renderCharts().                                                                       
  86   * Access functionality of the hosting activity with #getHost()                                                   
  87   * <p/>                                                                                                           
  88   * The hosting ChartsHost activity provides a section for displaying a date or date range                         
  89   * being the basis for the chart, as well as two buttons for moving backwards and forward                         
  90   * in time. The date is held by the activity, so that it can be shared by multiple chart                          
  91   * fragments. It is still the responsibility of the (currently visible) chart fragment                            
  92   * to set the desired date in the ChartsActivity via #setDateRange(Date,Date).                                    
  93   * The default implementations #handleDatePrev(Date,Date) and #handleDateNext(Date,Date)                          
  94   * shift the date by one day.                                                                                     
  95   */                                                                                                               
  96  public abstract class AbstractChartFragment extends AbstractGBFragment {                                          
  97      protected final int ANIM_TIME = 250;                                                                          
  98                                                                                                                    
  99      private static final Logger LOG = LoggerFactory.getLogger(AbstractChartFragment.class);                       
 100                                                                                                                    
 101      private final Set<String> mIntentFilterActions;                                                               
 102      private final BroadcastReceiver mReceiver = new BroadcastReceiver() {                                         
 103          @Override                                                                                                 
 104          public void onReceive(Context context, Intent intent) {                                                   
 105              AbstractChartFragment.this.onReceive(context, intent);                                                
 106          }                                                                                                         
 107      };                                                                                                            
 108      private boolean mChartDirty = true;                                                                           
 109      private AsyncTask refreshTask;                                                                                
 110                                                                                                                    
 111      public boolean isChartDirty() {                                                                               
 112          return mChartDirty;                                                                                       
 113      }                                                                                                             
 114                                                                                                                    
 115      @Override                                                                                                     
 116      public abstract String getTitle();                                                                            
 117                                                                                                                    
 118      public boolean supportsHeartrate(GBDevice device) {                                                           
 119          DeviceCoordinator coordinator = DeviceHelper.getInstance().getCoordinator(device);                        
 120          return coordinator != null && coordinator.supportsHeartRateMeasurement(device);                           
 121      }

 129              this.type = kind;                                                                                     
 130              this.label = label;                                                                                   
 131              this.color = color;                                                                                   
 132          }                                                                                                         
 133      }

 153                                                                                                                    
 154      protected AbstractChartFragment(String... intentFilterActions) {                                              
 155          mIntentFilterActions = new HashSet<>();                                                                   
 156          if (intentFilterActions != null) {                                                                        
 157              mIntentFilterActions.addAll(Arrays.asList(intentFilterActions));                                      
 158          }                                                                                                         
 159          mIntentFilterActions.add(ChartsHost.DATE_NEXT);                                                           
 160          mIntentFilterActions.add(ChartsHost.DATE_PREV);                                                           
 161          mIntentFilterActions.add(ChartsHost.REFRESH);                                                             
 162      }                                                                                                             
 163                                                                                                                    
 164      @Override                                                                                                     
 165      public void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState) {                                                             
 166          super.onCreate(savedInstanceState);                                                                       
 167                                                                                                                    
 168          init();                                                                                                   
 169                                                                                                                    
 170          IntentFilter filter = new IntentFilter();                                                                 
 171          for (String action : mIntentFilterActions) {                                                              
 172              filter.addAction(action);                                                                             
 173          }                                                                                                         
 174          LocalBroadcastManager.getInstance(getActivity()).registerReceiver(mReceiver, filter);                     
 175      }

 189          AK_LIGHT_SLEEP_COLOR = runningColor.data;                                                                 
 190          getContext().getTheme().resolveAttribute(R.attr.chart_not_worn, runningColor, true);                      
 191          AK_NOT_WORN_COLOR = runningColor.data;

 194

 222      /**                                                                                                           
 223       * Called when this fragment has been fully scrolled into the activity.                                       
 224       *                                                                                                            
 225       * @see #isVisibleInActivity()                                                                                
 226       * @see #onMadeInvisibleInActivity()                                                                          
 227       */                                                                                                           
 228      @Override                                                                                                     
 229      protected void onMadeVisibleInActivity() {                                                                    
 230          super.onMadeVisibleInActivity();                                                                          
 231          showDateBar(true);                                                                                        
 232          if (isChartDirty()) {                                                                                     
 233              refresh();                                                                                            
 234          }                                                                                                         
 235      }                                                                                                             
 236                                                                                                                    
 237      protected void showDateBar(boolean show) {                                                                    
 238          getChartsHost().getDateBar().setVisibility(show ? View.VISIBLE : View.INVISIBLE);                         
 239      }                                                                                                             
 240                                                                                                                    
 241      @Override                                                                                                     
 242      public void onDestroy() {                                                                                     
 243          super.onDestroy();                                                                                        
 244          LocalBroadcastManager.getInstance(getActivity()).unregisterReceiver(mReceiver);                           
 245      }                                                                                                             
 246                                                                                                                    
 247      protected void onReceive(Context context, Intent intent) {                                                    
 248          String action = intent.getAction();                                                                       
 249          if (ChartsHost.REFRESH.equals(action)) {                                                                  
 250              refresh();                                                                                            
 251          } else if (ChartsHost.DATE_NEXT.equals(action)) {                                                         
 252              handleDateNext(getStartDate(), getEndDate());                                                         
 253          } else if (ChartsHost.DATE_PREV.equals(action)) {                                                         
 254              handleDatePrev(getStartDate(), getEndDate());                                                         
 255          }                                                                                                         
 256      }                                                                                                             
 257                                                                                                                    
 258      /**                                                                                                           
 259       * Default implementation shifts the dates by one day, if visible                                             
 260       * and calls #refreshIfVisible().                                                                             
 261       *                                                                                                            
 262       * @param startDate                                                                                           
 263       * @param endDate                                                                                             
 264       */                                                                                                           
 265      protected void handleDatePrev(Date startDate, Date endDate) {                                                 
 266          if (isVisibleInActivity()) {                                                                              
 267              if (!shiftDates(startDate, endDate, -1)) {                                                            
 268                  return;                                                                                           
 269              }                                                                                                     
 270          }                                                                                                         
 271          refreshIfVisible();                                                                                       
 272      }                                                                                                             
 273                                                                                                                    
 274      /**                                                                                                           
 275       * Default implementation shifts the dates by one day, if visible                                             
 276       * and calls #refreshIfVisible().                                                                             
 277       *                                                                                                            
 278       * @param startDate                                                                                           
 279       * @param endDate                                                                                             
 280       */                                                                                                           
 281      protected void handleDateNext(Date startDate, Date endDate) {                                                 
 282          if (isVisibleInActivity()) {                                                                              
 283              if (!shiftDates(startDate, endDate, +1)) {                                                            
 284                  return;                                                                                           
 285              }                                                                                                     
 286          }                                                                                                         
 287          refreshIfVisible();                                                                                       
 288      }                                                                                                             
 289                                                                                                                    
 290      protected void refreshIfVisible() {                                                                           
 291          if (isVisibleInActivity()) {                                                                              
 292              refresh();                                                                                            
 293          } else {                                                                                                  
 294              mChartDirty = true;                                                                                   
 295          }                                                                                                         
 296      }                                                                                                             
 297                                                                                                                    
 298      /**                                                                                                           
 299       * Shifts the given dates by offset days. offset may be positive or negative.                                 
 300       *                                                                                                            
 301       * @param startDate                                                                                           
 302       * @param endDate                                                                                             
 303       * @param offset    a positive or negative number of days to shift the dates                                  
 304       * @return true if the shift was successful and false otherwise                                               
 305       */                                                                                                           
 306      protected boolean shiftDates(Date startDate, Date endDate, int offset) {                                      
 307          Date newStart = DateTimeUtils.shiftByDays(startDate, offset);                                             
 308          Date newEnd = DateTimeUtils.shiftByDays(endDate, offset);                                                 
 309                                                                                                                    
 310          return setDateRange(newStart, newEnd);                                                                    
 311      }                                                                                                             
 312                                                                                                                    
 313      protected Integer getColorFor(int activityKind) {                                                             
 314          switch (activityKind) {                                                                                   
 315              case ActivityKind.TYPE_DEEP_SLEEP:                                                                    
 316                  return akDeepSleep.color;                                                                         
 317              case ActivityKind.TYPE_LIGHT_SLEEP:                                                                   
 318                  return akLightSleep.color;                                                                        
 319              case ActivityKind.TYPE_ACTIVITY:                                                                      
 320                  return akActivity.color;                                                                          
 321          }                                                                                                         
 322          return akActivity.color;                                                                                  
 323      }

 325      protected SampleProvider<? extends AbstractActivitySample> getProvider(DBHandler db, GBDevice device) {       
 326          DeviceCoordinator coordinator = DeviceHelper.getInstance().getCoordinator(device);                        
 327          return coordinator.getSampleProvider(device, db.getDaoSession());                                         
 328      }

 354      protected void configureChartDefaults(Chart<?> chart) {                                                       
 355          chart.getXAxis().setValueFormatter(new TimestampValueFormatter());                                        
 356          chart.getDescription().setText("");                                                                       
 357                                                                                                                    
 358          // if enabled, the chart will always start at zero on the y-axis                                          
 359          chart.setNoDataText(getString(R.string.chart_no_data_synchronize));                                       
 360                                                                                                                    
 361          // disable value highlighting                                                                             
 362          chart.setHighlightPerTapEnabled(false);                                                                   
 363                                                                                                                    
 364          // enable touch gestures                                                                                  
 365          chart.setTouchEnabled(true);                                                                              
 366                                                                                                                    
 367  // commented out: this has weird bugs/sideeffects at least on WeekStepsCharts                                     
 368  // where only the first Day-label is drawn, because AxisRenderer.computeAxisValues(float,float)                   
 369  // appears to have an overflow when calculating 'n' (number of entries)                                           
 370  //        chart.getXAxis().setGranularity(60*5);                                                                  
 371                                                                                                                    
 372          setupLegend(chart);                                                                                       
 373      }                                                                                                             
 374                                                                                                                    
 375      protected void configureBarLineChartDefaults(BarLineChartBase<?> chart) {                                     
 376          configureChartDefaults(chart);                                                                            
 377          if (chart instanceof BarChart) {                                                                          
 378              ((BarChart) chart).setFitBars(true);                                                                  
 379          }                                                                                                         
 380                                                                                                                    
 381          // enable scaling and dragging                                                                            
 382          chart.setDragEnabled(true);                                                                               
 383          chart.setScaleEnabled(true);                                                                              
 384                                                                                                                    
 385          // if disabled, scaling can be done on x- and y-axis separately                                           
 386  //        chart.setPinchZoom(true);                                                                               
 387                                                                                                                    
 388          chart.setDrawGridBackground(false);                                                                       
 389      }                                                                                                             
 390                                                                                                                    
 391      /**                                                                                                           
 392       * This method will invoke a background task to read the data from the                                        
 393       * database, analyze it, prepare it for the charts and eventually call                                        
 394       * #renderCharts                                                                                              
 395       */                                                                                                           
 396      protected void refresh() {                                                                                    
 397          ChartsHost chartsHost = getChartsHost();                                                                  
 398          if (chartsHost != null) {                                                                                 
 399              if (chartsHost.getDevice() != null) {                                                                 
 400                  mChartDirty = false;                                                                              
 401                  updateDateInfo(getStartDate(), getEndDate());                                                     
 402                  if (refreshTask != null && refreshTask.getStatus() != AsyncTask.Status.FINISHED) {                
 403                      refreshTask.cancel(true);                                                                     
 404                  }                                                                                                 
 405                  refreshTask = createRefreshTask("Visualizing data", getActivity()).execute();                     
 406              }                                                                                                     
 407          }                                                                                                         
 408      }                                                                                                             
 409                                                                                                                    
 410      /**                                                                                                           
 411       * This method reads the data from the database, analyzes and prepares it for                                 
 412       * the charts. This will be called from a background task, so there must not be                               
 413       * any UI access. #updateChartsInUIThread and #renderCharts will be automatically called after this method.   
 414       */                                                                                                           
 415      protected abstract ChartsData refreshInBackground(ChartsHost chartsHost, DBHandler db, GBDevice device);      
 416                                                                                                                    
 417      /**                                                                                                           
 418       * Triggers the actual (re-) rendering of the chart.                                                          
 419       * Always called from the UI thread.                                                                          
 420       */                                                                                                           
 421      protected abstract void renderCharts();

 719                                                                                                                    
 720      public class RefreshTask extends DBAccess {                                                                   
 721          private ChartsData chartsData;                                                                            
 722                                                                                                                    
 723          public RefreshTask(String task, Context context) {                                                        
 724              super(task, context);                                                                                 
 725          }                                                                                                         
 726                                                                                                                    
 727          @Override                                                                                                 
 728          protected void doInBackground(DBHandler db) {                                                             
 729              ChartsHost chartsHost = getChartsHost();                                                              
 730              if (chartsHost != null) {                                                                             
 731                  chartsData = refreshInBackground(chartsHost, db, chartsHost.getDevice());                         
 732              } else {                                                                                              
 733                  cancel(true);                                                                                     
 734              }                                                                                                     
 735          }                                                                                                         
 736                                                                                                                    
 737          @Override                                                                                                 
 738          protected void onPostExecute(Object o) {                                                                  
 739              super.onPostExecute(o);                                                                               
 740              FragmentActivity activity = getActivity();                                                            
 741              if (activity != null && !activity.isFinishing() && !activity.isDestroyed()) {                         
 742                  updateChartsnUIThread(chartsData);                                                                
 743                  renderCharts();                                                                                   
 744              } else {                                                                                              
 745                  LOG.info("Not rendering charts because activity is not available anymore");                       
 746              }                                                                                                     
 747          }                                                                                                         
 748      }                                                                                                             
 749                                                                                                                    
 750      protected abstract void updateChartsnUIThread(ChartsData chartsData);                                         
 751                                                                                                                    
 752      /**                                                                                                           
 753       * Returns true if the date was successfully shifted, and false if the shift                                  
 754       * was ignored, e.g. when the to-value is in the future.                                                      
 755       *                                                                                                            
 756       * @param from                                                                                                
 757       * @param to                                                                                                  
 758       */                                                                                                           
 759      public boolean setDateRange(Date from, Date to) {                                                             
 760          if (from.compareTo(to) > 0) {                                                                             
 761              throw new IllegalArgumentException("Bad date range: " + from + ".." + to);                            
 762          }                                                                                                         
 763          Date now = new Date();                                                                                    
 764          if (to.after(now)) {                                                                                      
 765              return false;                                                                                         
 766          }                                                                                                         
 767          setStartDate(from);                                                                                       
 768          setEndDate(to);                                                                                           
 769          return true;                                                                                              
 770      }                                                                                                             
 771                                                                                                                    
 772      protected void updateDateInfo(Date from, Date to) {                                                           
 773          if (from.equals(to)) {                                                                                    
 774              getChartsHost().setDateInfo(DateTimeUtils.formatDate(from));                                          
 775          } else {                                                                                                  
 776              getChartsHost().setDateInfo(DateTimeUtils.formatDateRange(from, to));                                 
 777          }                                                                                                         
 778      }

 780      protected List<? extends ActivitySample> getSamples(DBHandler db, GBDevice device) {                          
 781          int tsStart = getTSStart();                                                                               
 782          int tsEnd = getTSEnd();                                                                                   
 783          List<ActivitySample> samples = (List<ActivitySample>) getSamples(db, device, tsStart, tsEnd);             
 784          ensureStartAndEndSamples(samples, tsStart, tsEnd);                                                        
 785  //        List<ActivitySample> samples2 = new ArrayList<>();                                                      
 786  //        int min = Math.min(samples.size(), 10);                                                                 
 787  //        int min = Math.min(samples.size(), 10);                                                                 
 788  //        for (int i = 0; i < min; i++) {                                                                         
 789  //            samples2.add(samples.get(i));                                                                       
 790  //        }                                                                                                       
 791  //        return samples2;                                                                                        
 792          return samples;                                                                                           
 793      }                                                                                                             
 794                                                                                                                    
 795      protected void ensureStartAndEndSamples(List<ActivitySample> samples, int tsStart, int tsEnd) {               
 796          if (samples == null || samples.isEmpty()) {                                                               
 797              return;                                                                                               
 798          }                                                                                                         
 799          ActivitySample lastSample = samples.get(samples.size() - 1);                                              
 800          if (lastSample.getTimestamp() < tsEnd) {                                                                  
 801              samples.add(createTrailingActivitySample(lastSample, tsEnd));                                         
 802          }                                                                                                         
 803                                                                                                                    
 804          ActivitySample firstSample = samples.get(0);                                                              
 805          if (firstSample.getTimestamp() > tsStart) {                                                               
 806              samples.add(createTrailingActivitySample(firstSample, tsStart));                                      
 807          }                                                                                                         
 808      }                                                                                                             
 809                                                                                                                    
 810      private ActivitySample createTrailingActivitySample(ActivitySample referenceSample, int timestamp) {          
 811          TrailingActivitySample sample = new TrailingActivitySample();                                             
 812          if (referenceSample instanceof AbstractActivitySample) {                                                  
 813              AbstractActivitySample reference = (AbstractActivitySample) referenceSample;                          
 814              sample.setUserId(reference.getUserId());                                                              
 815              sample.setDeviceId(reference.getDeviceId());                                                          
 816              sample.setProvider(reference.getProvider());                                                          
 817          }                                                                                                         
 818          sample.setTimestamp(timestamp);                                                                           
 819          return sample;                                                                                            
 820      }                                                                                                             
 821                                                                                                                    
 822      private int getTSEnd() {                                                                                      
 823          return toTimestamp(getEndDate());                                                                         
 824      }                                                                                                             
 825                                                                                                                    
 826      private int getTSStart() {                                                                                    
 827          return toTimestamp(getStartDate());                                                                       
 828      }                                                                                                             
 829                                                                                                                    
 830      private int toTimestamp(Date date) {                                                                          
 831          return (int) ((date.getTime() / 1000));                                                                   
 832      }

 852      protected static class SampleXLabelFormatter implements IAxisValueFormatter {                                 
 853          private final TimestampTranslation tsTranslation;                                                         
 854          SimpleDateFormat annotationDateFormat = new SimpleDateFormat("HH:mm");                                    
 855  //        SimpleDateFormat dateFormat = new SimpleDateFormat("dd.MM.yyyy HH:mm");                                 
 856          Calendar cal = GregorianCalendar.getInstance();                                                           
 857                                                                                                                    
 858          public SampleXLabelFormatter(TimestampTranslation tsTranslation) {                                        
 859              this.tsTranslation = tsTranslation;                                                                   
 860

 863          @Override                                                                                                 
 864          public String getFormattedValue(float value, AxisBase axis) {

 867              cal.setTimeInMillis(tsTranslation.toOriginalValue(ts) * 1000L);

 874      protected static class PreformattedXIndexLabelFormatter implements IAxisValueFormatter {                      
 875          private ArrayList<String> xLabels;                                                                        
 876                                                                                                                    
 877          public PreformattedXIndexLabelFormatter(ArrayList<String> xLabels) {                                      
 878              this.xLabels = xLabels;                                                                               
 879                                                                                                                    
 880          }                                                                                                         
 881          @Override                                                                                                 
 882          public String getFormattedValue(float value, AxisBase axis) {                                             
 883              int index = (int) value;                                                                              
 884              if (xLabels == null || index >= xLabels.size()) {                                                     
 885                  return String.valueOf(value);                                                                     
 886              }                                                                                                     
 887              return xLabels.get(index);                                                                            
 888          }

 891      /**                                                                                                           
 892       * Awkward class that helps in translating long timestamp                                                     
 893       * values to float (sic!) values. It basically rebases all                                                    
 894       * timestamps to a base (the very first) timestamp value.                                                     
 895       *                                                                                                            
 896       * It does this so that the large timestamp values can be used                                                
 897       * floating point values, where the mantissa is just 24 bits.                                                 
 898       */                                                                                                           
 899      protected static class TimestampTranslation {                                                                 
 900          private int tsOffset = -1;                                                                                
 901                                                                                                                    
 902          public int shorten(int timestamp) {                                                                       
 903              if (tsOffset == -1) {                                                                                 
 904                  tsOffset = timestamp;                                                                             
 905                  return 0;                                                                                         
 906              }                                                                                                     
 907              return timestamp - tsOffset;                                                                          
 908          }                                                                                                         
 909                                                                                                                    
 910          public int toOriginalValue(int timestamp) {                                                               
 911              if (tsOffset == -1) {                                                                                 
 912                  return timestamp;                                                                                 
 913              }                                                                                                     
 914              return timestamp + tsOffset;                                                                          
 915          }                                                                                                         
 916      }                                                                                                             
 917  }
